akn:content.akn:p: § 2355. Effect of defective execution Any document to be filed in the Plant Variety Protection Office and which is required by any law or regulation to be executed in a specified manner may be provisionally accepted by the Secretary despite a defective execution, provided a properly executed document is submitted within such time as may be prescribed. (Pub. L. 91–577, title I, § 25, Dec. 24, 1970, 84 Stat. 1545.)
